Computer.name: ComSoft Workstation 2
Computer.file: In case of emergency, backups are stored here: 181.189.28.57 DEC encryption will keep them safe in case of attack :)

Why does the source control server have to be off-site? The wait times are seriously hampering our productivity! The added security probably won't matter given that they've been used in some script-kiddie's botnet recently, please move them back on-site so we can work at a speed that's not reminiscent of the early nineties. -Jung-Kook
